## Model.(constructor)

Creates an instance of model node

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scene | [Scene](doc/markdown/./scene.scene.md) | The scene to which the model belongs |
